abstract: It’s no secret that Bank of America has been cutting back on its expenses in the wake of its subprime-related losses. But judging from some reports in the week after Christmas, the firm seemed to have become unusually Grinch-like in its efforts.
lead_paragraph: It’s no secret that Bank of America has been cutting back on its expenses in the wake of its subprime-related losses. But judging from some reports in the week after Christmas, the firm seemed to have become unusually Grinch-like in its efforts.

headline.main: Bank of America: We’ve Still Got Soap
